title: Marbled
lyrics:
Wasted at 3 AM with the homies
Girls I donʼt know and I still get lonely
Mmm
Blunts with the cigarette pack
And a flicker of light in a smoke-filled room Iʼm zoning



Look at the stars in the sky

And the man never cared

A pill and a half

And the hands in the air

Whatʼs the plan going there?

Avoid those mites donʼt dare let em near



Wasted at 3 AM with the homies

Girls I donʼt know and I still get lonely

Still get lonely



Ainʼt nothing worth it

Myself not either

Ainʼt moving further

Fix up the tires

Throat is a nightmare

Spit and then gargle

My only pitfall is I think Iʼm marbled and sick

Yeah

I think Iʼm marbled as shit

My only pitfall is I think Iʼm marbled like this



Wasted at 9 AM

In the morning, drunk when the sun comes up now Iʼm lonely

Mmm



Blunt with the cigarette wrapped

Now Iʼm waiting for the night cause I know the whole day Iʼm zoning



Oh what a sinner

Low and behold

Iʼm playing life on beginner

The points stacking in change

And ainʼt no change to be given

No B to follow the A

Read and follow the grades

The rules given are simple

Begin again

Binge and drink again

Smile and pretend again

Ladies and gentlemen

Welcome to rock bottom

Now I be swimming with Goldfishes when god called up

Told him come pick me out of this bowl cause



Ainʼt nothing worth it

Myself not either

Ainʼt moving further

Fix up the tires

Throat is a nightmare

Spit and then gargle

My only pitfall is I think Iʼm marbled and sick

Yeah

I think Iʼm marbled as shit

My only pitfall is I think Iʼm marbled and sick



Look at the stars in the sky

And the man never cared

A pill and a half

And the hands in the air

Whatʼs the plan going there?

Avoid those mites donʼt dare let em near



Wasted at 3 AM with the homies

Girls I donʼt know and I still get lonely

Still get lonely
